Articles.Content: Despite the title to this thread I am not Spanish, I am 23 and from Wales, been playing KSP for about 2 months now after seeing gameplay from Scott Manley on the YouTube homepage. I do not claim to be very scientific ( I got a C in GCSE Physics) but I love the fact that I can play KSP and not really have to be a rocket scientist. Anyway I look forward to contributing to the forum. See you around

Welcome to the forums!

I know exactly what you mean. I don't have a strong academic background in rocket science myself (math wasn't even my best subject in school), but it's amazing what you can learn in a short amount of time when you have the motivation to do so. Feel free to look around the forums and ask questions about the game, or even answer other players' questions if you feel confident enough in your answers. We welcome anyone who's willing to make a positive contribution to the community
